Amelekana.name: 风琴蜗牛 Amelekana

Reflective Shell.name: 逆光坚壳 Reflective Shell
Reflective Shell.description: 风琴蜗牛潜水时在隐秘上获得+4环境加值。如果该水体处于流动状态的话，这一加值还会提高到+8。

Lob Amoeba.name: 抛射原虫 Lob Amoeba
Lob Amoeba.description:
风琴蜗牛朝40尺内的一个目标投掷出一团与之共生的阿米巴原虫@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.gatewalkers-bestiary.Actor.HypIeplCDn0Phqs4]{共生原虫 Symbiotic Amoeba}——这是一次远程攻击且不计入风琴蜗牛的多重攻击减值，多重攻击减值也不适用于此次攻击。

成功 该生物受到@Damage[(2d4+8)[bludgeoning]]伤害且共生原虫会落在目标生物的一个邻接方格内。

失败 该生物不受伤害，但目标生物的一个邻接方格内仍会产生一只共生原虫。

大失败 该生物不受伤害，且共生原虫由于抛射冲击而直接死去。

Symbiotic Amoeba.description:
由风琴蜗牛产生的共生原虫是一种超小型的，无心智的半独立生物，由风琴蜗牛所控制。它具有仆从特征，AC为15，生命值为1，且与风琴蜗牛具有相同的技能和豁免。每一轮，风琴蜗牛可以使用指挥仆从来命令一只共生原虫快步或游泳20尺并且进行一次伪足打击（近战伪足 +13，伤害 2d4 酸蚀）。如果宿主风琴蜗牛死亡，与它共生的原虫会全部由于其宿主的精神反冲而死。一头风琴蜗牛同时最多拥有三只共生原虫存在。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.gatewalkers-bestiary.Actor.HypIeplCDn0Phqs4]{共生原虫 Symbiotic Amoeba}
Symbiotic Amoeba.name: 共生原虫 Symbiotic Amoeba

Amelekana.publicNotes:
风琴蜗牛是一种分布于卡斯卓韦河流湖畔的一种善于伏击的肉食性捕食者。风琴蜗牛的外表与普通巨蜗牛接近，有着乳白色的螺旋蜗壳与生出六根突触的无眼头部，但它们之间相似的地方也仅限于此了。与只有一根巨大吸盘足的蜗牛不同，风琴蜗牛的壳开有许多小洞，向外伸出血肉的软管，而且身下长有带壳的小足，与蟹类近似。而风琴蜗牛最显著的特征或许就是它实际上是两种独立的生物组成的共生体，二者如果离开彼此都无法生存。

和卡斯卓韦的许多生物一样，风琴蜗牛有着基本的灵能力量——对于它们而言具体来说，是感知附近活物的能力。一头狩猎中的风琴蜗牛会潜入水中隐藏自己的位置。当猎物靠近时，他们就会从水中暴起，用释放压缩气体为动力发射共生体——一种长面包大小的斑点状阿米巴原虫——来攻击受害者。这些阿米巴原虫相当于无胃的风琴蜗牛的外延消化器官，用其酸性包层来分解猎物并吸收其中的营养物质。只要这些阿米巴原虫吸得满满当当，风琴蜗牛就会将其收回进食，在其体内为阿米巴原虫的共生群落提供安全庇护来换取它们所摄取的部分养分。

典型的风琴蜗牛有9尺长，2000磅重。

Blooming Jijioa.name: 绽放的吉吉沃 Blooming Jijioa

Solar Bloom.name: 阳光绽放 Solar Bloom
Solar Bloom.description:
触发 吉吉沃丛暴露在了太阳耀斑下

效果 无数吉吉沃花突然绽放，将周围的太阳热量放大百倍。处于吉吉沃丛中的生物受到@Damage[4d6[fire]]伤害（@Check[fortitude|dc:22|basic]豁免）。在吉吉沃丛中结束回合的生物会在吉吉沃绽放期间以此方式持续受到伤害。

Blooming Jijioa.disable: @Check[survival|dc:22] (受训) 来移除5尺方格的吉吉沃，或5点火焰伤害能摧毁受影响的区域。
Blooming Jijioa.hazarddescription: 看不见的太阳耀斑会导致这片毫不招摇的地面草丛突然绽放成一片辐射场。
Blooming Jijioa.reset: 绽放后一小时，吉吉沃丛会进入休眠期1周。

Bolan Nogasso.name: 博兰·诺伽索 Bolan Nogasso
Bolan Nogasso.blurb: 男性 人类 德鲁伊

Guardian Thorns.name: 戍卫棘刺 Guardian Thorns
Guardian Thorns.description: 博兰迫使自己周围@Template[emanation|distance:10]{10尺}内基于植物制成的物体生长出锋利的棘刺与尖锐的枝条。此能力同样会影响所有用失活有机材料，譬如木材，制成的墙壁，地板和其他大型物件。受影响的区域变为困难地形。非精类且非植物的生物在受影响区域内或是在试图穿过影响区域时受到@Damage[2d10[piercing]]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:18|basic]豁免）。此能力不会影响石头，泥土，活体植物及其他不具有植物特征的材料。当博兰离开受影响区域时效果结束。

Item Treachery.name: 物品变节 Item Treachery
Item Treachery.description:
博兰指定60尺内一件正持用的物品，其构成组分必须为，或部分包含，木材，棉纱或其它非活体植物材料（譬如一把弓杖（译者注：原文bow stave，不存在这一物品，可能是武僧武器bow staff的笔误），木盾或卷轴）该物品基于植物制成的部分活化并扭动着尝试脱离其持用者的掌控。持用者必须进行一次@Check[reflex|dc:18]豁免。

成功 该生物不受负面效果地抓牢了此物品。

失败 该生物难以抓牢此物品。直到该生物下回合开始，尝试@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{卸武 Disarm}该生物所持用的受影响物品时获得+2环境加值，且该生物用受影响物品进行攻击或其它需要抓牢的动作时获得-2环境减值。

大失败 该生物将受影响物品掉落在自己占据的空间或博兰指定的相邻方格，随后该物品恢复原状。

Vengeful Fibers.name: 仇讨纤丝 Vengeful Fibers
Vengeful Fibers.description:
在博兰的指命下，一件衣物活化并攻击其穿着者。博兰指定60尺内一名穿着由植物材料制成的衣物，譬如棉纱，麻布或草裙等，的生物。这件衣物开始紧缚其穿着者，限制其移动并绞磨其肌肤。目标受到@Damage[2d10[bludgeoning]]伤害（@Check[fortitude|dc:18|basic]豁免）。以此法受到伤害的生物还会陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Off-Guard}且其速度受到-10尺环境减值，直到博兰的下回合开始。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.zNOomUXHZHcc1PWD]{效果：仇讨纤丝}

Light.name: Light
Light.description:
The object glows, casting bright light in a 20-foot radius (and dim light for the next 20 feet) like a torch. If you cast this spell again on a second object, the light spell on the first object ends.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.cVVZXNbV0nElVOPZ]{Spell Effect: Light}

Heightened (4th) The object sheds bright light in a 60-foot radius (and dim light for the next 60 feet).

Ray of Frost.name: Ray of Frost
Ray of Frost.description:
You blast an icy ray. Make a spell attack roll. The ray deals 2d4 cold damage.

Critical Success The target takes double damage and takes a -10-foot status penalty to its Speeds for 1 round.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.I4PsUAaYSUJ8pwKC]{Spell Effect: Ray of Frost}

Success The target takes normal damage.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d4.

Shillelagh.name: Shillelagh
Shillelagh.description:
The target grows vines and leaves, brimming with primal energy. The target becomes a +1 striking weapon while in your hands, gaining a +1 item bonus to attack rolls and increasing the number of weapon damage dice to two. Additionally, as long as you are on your home plane, attacks you make with the target against aberrations, extraplanar creatures, and undead increase the number of weapon damage dice to three.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.deG1dtfuQph03Kkg]{Spell Effect: Shillelagh}

Acid Splash.name: Acid Splash
Acid Splash.description:
You splash a glob of acid that splatters your target and nearby creatures. Make a spell attack. If you hit, you deal 1d6 acid damage plus 1 splash acid damage. On a critical success, the target also takes @Damage[(ceil(@item.level/2))[persistent,acid]] damage.

Heightened (3rd) The initial damage increases to 2d6, and the persistent damage increases to 2.

Heightened (5th) The initial damage increases to 3d6, the persistent damage increases to 3, and the splash damage increases to 2.

Heightened (7th) The initial damage increases to 4d6, the persistent damage increases to 4, and the splash damage increases to 3.

Heightened (9th) The initial damage increases to 5d6, the persistent damage increases to 5, and the splash damage increases to 4.

Burning Hands.name: Burning Hands
Burning Hands.description:
Gouts of flame rush from your hands. You deal 2d6 fire damage to creatures in the area.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d6.

Fleet Step.name: Fleet Step
Fleet Step.description:
You gain a +30-foot status bonus to your Speed.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.ThFug45WHkQQXcoF]{Spell Effect: Fleet Step}

Guidance.name: Guidance
Guidance.description:
You ask for divine guidance, granting the target a +1 status bonus to one attack roll, Perception check, saving throw, or skill check the target attempts before the duration ends. The target chooses which roll to use the bonus on before rolling. If the target uses the bonus, the spell ends. Either way, the target is then temporarily immune for 1 hour.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.3qHKBDF7lrHw8jFK]{Spell Effect: Guidance}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.3LyOkV25p7wA181H]{Effect: Guidance Immunity}

Summon Fey.name: Summon Fey
Summon Fey.description:
You conjure a fey to fight for you. This works like @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.4YnON9JHYqtLzccu]{Summon Animal}, except you summon a common creature that has the fey trait and whose level is -1.

Heightened (2nd) Level 1

Heightened (3rd) Level 2

Heightened (4th) Level 3

Heightened (5th) Level 5

Heightened (6th) Level 7

Heightened (7th) Level 9

Heightened (8th) Level 11

Heightened (9th) Level 13

Heightened (10th) Level 15

Tanglefoot.name: Tanglefoot
Tanglefoot.description:
A vine covered in sticky sap appears from thin air, flicking from your hand and lashing itself to the target. Attempt a spell attack against the target.

Critical Success The target gains the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} condition and takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds for 1 round. It can attempt to Escape against your spell DC to remove the penalty and the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} condition.

Success The target takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds for 1 round. It can attempt to Escape against your spell DC to remove the penalty.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.TwtUIEyenrtAbeiX]{Spell Effect: Tangle Vine}

Failure The target is unaffected.

Heightened (2nd) The effects last for 2 rounds.

Heightened (4th) The effects last for 1 minute.

equipment-Staff.name: Staff
equipment-Staff.description: This long piece of wood can aid in walking and deliver a mighty blow.

Wild Morph (Plant Shape).name: Wild Morph (Plant Shape)
Wild Morph (Plant Shape).description:
You morph your body based on your training, choosing one of the following effects based on your wild order feats.

  • If you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.VaIHQzOE5ibmbtqU]{Untamed Form}, you can morph your hands into wild claws. Your hands transform into incredibly sharp claws. These claws are an unarmed attack you're trained in and deal 1d6 slashing damage each (agile, finesse). You can still hold and use items with your hands while they're transformed by this spell, but you cannot hold an item while attacking.
  • If you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.OWedlrKGsVZVkSnT]{Insect Shape}, you can instead transform your mouth into wild jaws, an unarmed attack you're trained in that deals 1d8 piercing damage.
  • If you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.F0MYBfiyOD8YHq5t]{Elemental Shape}, you can morph your body to be partially composed of elemental matter, granting you resistance 5 to critical hits and precision damage.
  • If you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.I9rSWQyueWHQyNxe]{Plant Shape}, you can morph your arms into long vines, increasing your reach to 10 feet (or 15 feet with a reach weapon).
  • If you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.wNHUryoRzlfDCFAd]{Soaring Shape}, you can cast the spell as a two-action activity (2 somatic, verbal) to grow wings from your back. These wings allow you to fly with a fly Speed of 30 feet.

Heightened (6th) You can choose up to two of the effects from the list. Wild claws leave terrible, ragged wounds that also deal @Damage[2d6[bleed]] on a hit, and wild jaws are envenomed, also dealing @Damage[2d6[persistent,poison]] on a hit.

Heightened (10th) You can choose up to three of the effects from the list. Wild claws deal @Damage[4d6[bleed]] on a hit, and wild jaws deal @Damage[4d6[persistent,poison]] on a hit.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.rTVZ0zwiKeslRw6p]{Spell Effect: Untamed Shift}

equipment-Dagger.name: Dagger
equipment-Dagger.description: This small, bladed weapon is held in one hand and used to stab a creature in close combat. It can also be thrown.

equipment-Hide Armor.name: Hide Armor
equipment-Hide Armor.description: A mix of furs, sturdy hide, and sometimes molded boiled leather, this armor provides protection due to its layers of leather, though its bulkiness slows the wearer down and decreases mobility.

Captain Salah.name: 莎拉队长 Captain Salah

Trample.name: 践踏 Trample
Trample.description:
中型或更小体型, 蹄踢, @Check[reflex|dc:18|basic]豁免

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.Trample]

equipment-Longsword.name: Longsword
equipment-Longsword.description: Longswords can be one-edged or two-edged swords. Their blades are heavy and they're between 3 and 4 feet in length.

equipment-Spear.name: Spear
equipment-Spear.description: A long metal shaft ending with a metal spike, a spear can be used one-handed as a melee weapon and can be thrown.

Steel Shield.name: Steel Shield
Steel Shield.description:
Like wooden shields, steel shields come in a variety of shapes and sizes. Though more expensive than wooden shields, they are much more durable.

Hardness HP BT
5 20 10

equipment-Breastplate.name: Breastplate
equipment-Breastplate.description: Though referred to as a breastplate, this type of armor consists of several pieces of plate or half-plate armor that protect the torso, chest, neck, and sometimes the hips and lower legs. It strategically grants some of the protection of plate while allowing greater flexibility and speed.

equipment-Cloak of Gnawing Leaves.name: Cloak of Gnawing Leaves
equipment-Cloak of Gnawing Leaves.description:
This cloak appears to be woven from a thousand living leaves, hungry for flesh and eager to defend the cloak's wearer.

Activate r envision

Frequency once per day

Trigger You are damaged by a melee attack from an adjacent creature

Effect The leaves lash out at your attacker, rising up to reveal snapping jaws made of wicked thorns. The triggering creature must attempt a @Check[reflex|dc:17] saving throw.

Success The creature is unaffected.

Failure The creature takes @Damage[1d4[piercing]].

Critical Failure The creature takes @Damage[2d4[piercing]] and @Damage[1[bleed]].

Captain Salah.publicNotes:
半人马是传说中的猎手和追踪者，它们腰部以上看起来像肌肉发达的人类，腰部以下则像强壮的马。它们一般避世隐居，但是态度高傲，认为它们英俊的体格和悠久的文化传统让它们比任何遇到的两腿直立生物更加优越。虽然关于半人马和人形定居者之间的血腥冲突的故事众所周知，但其实半人马并非天生嗜血，也并不鲁莽好斗。相反，它们骄傲而固执，对于侵犯它们祖先的土地的外人抱有敌意，其中一些土地可能被半人马统治了数千年之久。面对那些无视警告继续掠夺自然的家伙，半人马会毫不犹豫地运用它们精纯的狩猎技巧对其造成重创。

半人马精通各种武器，一如它们擅长使用自己的蹄子。半人马在平原上冲锋时的雷鸣常被误认为是地震。虽然有着孤僻的天性，一些半人马会和精灵、精类、地精或偏远的人类社群结成同盟。这些盟友常常因为半人马的荣誉感、务实以及所掌握的荒野学识的深度而感到震惊。很少有半人马会离开其自己的部落而周游更广阔的世界。这些孤独的半人马流浪者更容易融入人形生物的社会，但是其他半人马会认为是某种耻辱导致了它们被放逐，因此会和这些半人马流浪者保持距离。

不同族群的半人马的个体和颜色都有着令人难以置信的差异。它们的上半身在同一个部落或同一个地区里会非常接近，但是下半身——就像马一样——就连父母和子女之间都可能存在很大的不同。大部分半人马至少有7尺高，体重超过2000磅。

通常一个半人马部落由几十名成员组成，由一个年长而强大的预言者或久经沙场的、因为许多高尚行为而备受尊敬的战士领导。受人尊敬的领袖会指导整个部落的生活方式；而明智的预言者可能会鼓励整个部落在远离文明的地方游牧，以保持祖先流传下的生活方式；而好斗的战士可能会和附近的人类定居点或敌对的半人马部落发生冲突。

Cliffhunter Pteranodon.name: 峭壁猎手翼龙 Cliffhunter Pteranodon

Pluck.name: 豪攫 Pluck
Pluck.description:
峭壁猎手翼龙尝试将自己的猎物抛入悬崖或其它有害处境。

频率 每轮一次

触发 峭壁猎手翼龙本回合的上一个动作是一次成功的喙啄打击。峭壁猎手翼龙可以在俯冲的过程中使用本能力

效果 翼龙尝试将打击命中的目标抛掷到危险之地。翼龙进行一次@Check[athletics|defense:fortitude]检定来对抗目标的强韧DC。

成功 目标生物被朝翼龙选择的方向抛掷15尺并可能因此坠落或受到伤害。该生物无法使用@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.3yoajuKjwHZ9ApUY]{抓住边缘 Grab an Edge}反应。

失败 翼龙没能甩动该生物。

大失败 如同失败，但翼龙笨拙的动作使其空门大开。当翼龙本回合结束时，其直到下个回合开始陷入措手不及。

Swoop.name: 飞扑 Swoop
Swoop.description: 无齿翼龙以它的飞行速度飞行，并在这一行动中的任何时刻进行一次喙啄打击。

Cliffhunter Pteranodon.publicNotes:
翼龙是兼具快速和灵巧的爬行动物，翼展达到20尺，这使得他们能在气流中悬浮好几个小时。这些生物有长长的喙和从后脑勺伸出的同样长的冠。

翼龙是一种原始的飞行生物。虽然它们中的很多都比人类小，但下面介绍的这两种要大得多，每一种都可能对人构成严重威胁。这些会飞的爬行动物在许多地区都能找到，但它们往往在温暖或温带气候的天空之上翱翔。

Cordon Alarm.name: 隔离带警报 Cordon Alarm
Cordon Alarm.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:18] (受训) 以在不触发警报的情况下解开绳子，或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{解除魔法 Dispel Magic} (1环级；反制DC 16) 以解除绳上的魔法
Cordon Alarm.hazarddescription: 一根系在树上的麻绳，散发出一座@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{隐形 Invisible}的圆柱障壁，当跨越它时就会发出声响作为警报。
Cordon Alarm.reset: 警报会立即重置。复数的入侵者会在不同的闯入点同时触发警报，不过警报每轮只会被触发一次。

Alarm.name: 警报 Alarm
Alarm.description:
触发 一个至少负载1的物体或生物穿过了绳子垂直方向上下分别延伸30尺的隐形屏障

效果 绳子从遭到闯入的位置发出如同愤怒松鼠的叫声。警报的音量与成年人类喊叫相同并且持续1分钟。如果警报结束时闯入者仍然存在，警报立即再次触发。

Corpse Disposal.name: 尸体处理坑 Corpse Disposal
Corpse Disposal.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:18] (受训) 以卡住活板门防止其打开
Corpse Disposal.hazarddescription: 一扇木头活板门之下隐藏着布满尖刺的落穴，大小10尺见方而深20尺。攀爬逃出落穴的DC为@Check[athletics|dc:10|traits:action:climb]。
Corpse Disposal.stealthdetails: (若活板门被解除或破坏则为0)

Dispose.name: 处理程序 Dispose
Dispose.description:
触发 一名生物踏入活板门区域（即地图上所有标志“T”的方格）

效果 触发生物掉入落穴。该生物可以尝试@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.3yoajuKjwHZ9ApUY]{抓住边缘 Grab an Edge}反应以避免坠落。若落入其中，该生物坠落20尺（这意味着受到来自坠落的@Damage[10[bludgeoning]]伤害）并受到从落穴底部伸出的金属尖刺造成的@Damage[3d6[piercing]]伤害。受到尖刺造成伤害的生物会暴露于破伤风之下。

Tetanus.name: 破伤风 Tetanus
Tetanus.description:
豁免检定 @Check[fortitude|dc:14]

潜伏期 10天

阶段1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 1} （1周）

阶段2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 2}并且无法说话（1天）

阶段3 因肌肉痉挛而陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed}（1天）

阶段4 死亡

Delphon.name: 德律丰 Delphon
Delphon.blurb: 男性 矮人 橡树家宰执法者

equipment-Oak Leaf Mask.name: 橡叶面具 Oak Leaf Mask

Wild Shape.name: 荒野形态 Wild Shape
Wild Shape.description:
频率 每天一次

效果 橡树家宰的双手在一分钟内变为狂野利爪。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.lBpprC8VD4GRzTtg]{效果：荒野形态-橡树家宰}

Light.name: Light
Light.description:
The object glows, casting bright light in a 20-foot radius (and dim light for the next 20 feet) like a torch. If you cast this spell again on a second object, the light spell on the first object ends.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.cVVZXNbV0nElVOPZ]{Spell Effect: Light}

Heightened (4th) The object sheds bright light in a 60-foot radius (and dim light for the next 60 feet).

Magic Fang.name: Magic Fang
Magic Fang.description:
Choose one of the target's unarmed attacks. You cause that unarmed attack to shine with primal energy. The unarmed attack becomes a +1 striking unarmed attack, gaining a +1 item bonus to attack rolls and increasing the number of damage dice to two if it had only one.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.MqZ6FScbfGtXB8tt]{Spell Effect: Runic Body}

Ray of Frost.name: Ray of Frost
Ray of Frost.description:
You blast an icy ray. Make a spell attack roll. The ray deals 2d4 cold damage.

Critical Success The target takes double damage and takes a -10-foot status penalty to its Speeds for 1 round.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.I4PsUAaYSUJ8pwKC]{Spell Effect: Ray of Frost}

Success The target takes normal damage.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d4.

Tanglefoot.name: Tanglefoot
Tanglefoot.description:
A vine covered in sticky sap appears from thin air, flicking from your hand and lashing itself to the target. Attempt a spell attack against the target.

Critical Success The target gains the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} condition and takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds for 1 round. It can attempt to Escape against your spell DC to remove the penalty and the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} condition.

Success The target takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds for 1 round. It can attempt to Escape against your spell DC to remove the penalty.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.TwtUIEyenrtAbeiX]{Spell Effect: Tangle Vine}

Failure The target is unaffected.

Heightened (2nd) The effects last for 2 rounds.

Heightened (4th) The effects last for 1 minute.

Shillelagh.name: Shillelagh
Shillelagh.description:
The target grows vines and leaves, brimming with primal energy. The target becomes a +1 striking weapon while in your hands, gaining a +1 item bonus to attack rolls and increasing the number of weapon damage dice to two. Additionally, as long as you are on your home plane, attacks you make with the target against aberrations, extraplanar creatures, and undead increase the number of weapon damage dice to three.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.deG1dtfuQph03Kkg]{Spell Effect: Shillelagh}

Stabilize.name: Stabilize
Stabilize.description: Vitality energy shuts death's door. The target loses the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{Dying} condition, though it remains @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious} at 0 Hit Points.

equipment-Leather Armor.name: Leather Armor
equipment-Leather Armor.description: A mix of flexible and molded boiled leather, a suit of this type of armor provides some protection with maximum flexibility.

equipment-Staff.name: Staff
equipment-Staff.description: This long piece of wood can aid in walking and deliver a mighty blow.

equipment-Acid Flask (Lesser).name: Acid Flask (Lesser)
equipment-Acid Flask (Lesser).description:
Activate A Strike

This flask filled with corrosive acid deals 1 acid damage, 1d6 persistent acid damage, and 1 acid splash damage.

Desa-Desa.name: 德萨-德萨 Desa-Desa

Bubble Venom.name: 气泡猛毒 Bubble Venom
Bubble Venom.description:
被气泡猫咬中的生物创处突然出现大片剧痛的水泡，它们会扩散并爆开，因为受害者身体内的组织液被转化为了易爆气体。任何类型的魔法治疗效果都可以反制气泡猛毒；

豁免检定 @Check[fortitude|dc:18]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 获得火焰弱点2并受到@Damage[1d6[piercing]]伤害（1轮）

阶段2 获得火焰弱点4并受到@Damage[2d6[piercing]]伤害（1轮）

Fire Blast.name: 焰爆 Fire Blast
Fire Blast.description: 气泡猫释放出一阵易爆气体使其爆燃，对@Template[emanation|distance:5]内所有生物造成@Damage[3d6[fire]]伤害。在[[/br 1d4 #Recharge Fire Blast]]{1d4轮}内气泡猫无法再次使用焰爆。

Volatile Gasses.description: 只要气泡猫受到电击伤害，它必须尝试一次@Check[fortitude|dc:18]豁免。若失败，电弧将会导致气泡猫立即引发焰爆（如果能够使用的话），且气泡猫陷入1轮的措手不及。
Volatile Gasses.name: 易爆气体 Volatile Gasses

Desa-Desa.publicNotes:
通常被称为“气泡猫”或“瓦斯猫”，德萨-德萨是一种略具猫科特征的小型捕食者，主要分布在卡斯卓韦的丛林当中。一只典型的气泡猫体型与山猫仿佛。其有着像是爬行类动物的头，突出的大眼以及从嘴唇伸出的细长獠牙。气泡猫的毛皮会根据所居环境而稍有不同——大都为深绿色或棕色——且其上零星地长出如同泡泡一般的细小液泡，看上去像是患了囊肿。每头气泡猫的液泡分布样式都不同，且这种独特的结构特性是它能够生存的立足之本。

气泡猫的生存方式要围绕一种原理尚且不明（但很可能是魔法）的生理过程，在体内贮存的水分转化为多种气体元素构成的混合物。气泡猫将这种气体压缩在它身上螅虫一般的液泡当中，而其内部还衬有某种导电材料，使得这种生物可以利用生物电火花将气泡朝各个方向爆裂发射。

作为捕食者，气泡猫最危险的攻击方式是它的啮咬，因为在此过程中它会将气泡毒素送入猎物体内，使得受害者自身的体液遭到破坏。这种效应会导致目标的细胞液迅速喷涌流失，从肌肉渗出到皮肤表面形成充盈气体的水泡，这种巨大的水疱在从形成到爆裂的过程中会造成巨大的痛苦。而疱疹中充斥的易燃气体同样使得该生物对火焰攻击尤为脆弱——譬如气泡猫用以自我防卫的焰爆。一只典型的气泡猫头至尾有4尺长，重约30磅。

Exploding Stove.name: 爆发炉灶 Exploding Stove
Exploding Stove.hazarddescription: 这座灶台已经被加装了爆炸物，一旦地板下的压力传感器受压就会爆炸。

Explode.name: 爆炸 Explode
Explode.description:
触发 一名角色进入了灶台5尺以内的区域

效果 灶台发生爆炸，对10尺内的所有生物造成@Damage[(2d10+13)[fire]]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:20|basic]豁免）。

Exploding Stove.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:20] (受训) 以解除压力传感器，或@Check[survival|dc:20] (受训) 以安全地熄灭炉灶里的火焰

Falling Bridge.name: 坠落之桥 Falling Bridge
Falling Bridge.disable: @Check[survival|dc:20] (受训) 以重新加固桥梁的连接绳索
Falling Bridge.hazarddescription: 桥梁两端的连接绳都遭到了磨损，一旦桥中央承受一定重量就会断裂。

Collapse.name: 分崩离析 Collapse
Collapse.description:
触发 一名中型或更大的生物踏入桥梁中央（即地图上所有标志“T”的方格）

效果 桥梁两边的绳索同时断裂开来，致使整座桥梁分崩离析。任何身处桥上的生物跌落到下方50尺的森林地表并受到跌落造成的@Damage[25[bludgeoning]]伤害。在桥梁两端10尺以内的生物可以尝试一次@Check[reflex|dc:18]豁免以抓住边缘，从而抵达区域A8或A13。

如果桥梁的连接绳只有一端经过加固而解除了危险，一名身处桥梁任何位置的角色都可以尝试一次@Check[reflex|dc:18]豁免来抓住绳索避免跌落。桥梁的悬索随后形成一条从区域A8或A13（取决于加固的是哪一端）到森林地表的绳梯。

Formian Sting Trench.name: 弗米蚁族刺沟 Formian Sting Trench

Entrench.name: 陷入沟中 Entrench
Entrench.description:
触发 一个生物走上帆布

效果 生物落入隐秘的沟中，受到坠落伤害（通常为@Damage[10[bludgeoning]]伤害）。生物还将随着坠落被三根毒刺蛰中。生物可以使用@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.3yoajuKjwHZ9ApUY]{抓住边缘 Grab an Edge}反应动作来免于坠落。

Formian Trench Poison.name: 弗米蚁族刺沟毒 Formian Trench Poison
Formian Trench Poison.description:
豁免检定 @Check[fortitude|dc:21]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 @Damage[1d6[poison]]（1轮）

阶段2 @Damage[1d6[poison]]和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 1}（1轮）

阶段3 @Damage[1d6[poison]]、笨拙1和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1}（1轮）

阶段4 @Damage[2d6[poison]]、笨拙1和力竭1（1轮）

Formian Sting Trench.hazarddescription: 一张薄帆布盖住了这个10尺见方的坑，其内壁上嵌有匕首大小的弗米蚁族蛰针。落入陷阱的生物有被毒刺蛰伤的风险。
Formian Sting Trench.reset: 虽然生物仍然可以坠落进陷阱，但帆布必须人工重置来让陷阱重新进入藏匿状态。

Haunted Aiudara.name: 作祟的艾厄达拉 Haunted Aiudara
Haunted Aiudara.hazarddescription: 死去许久的探险家们的精神印记作祟于这个艾厄达拉，表现为三人一组嫉妒地守护着传送门的星界缚灵。
Haunted Aiudara.routine:
(3个动作；咒法系，神术，传送) 使用幽灵鬼爪，艾厄达拉缚灵能越过时间和空间攻击闯入者。三个缚灵每个都有一个动作，能用来对60尺内的一个生物进行力场之手打击。每次对解除作祟的成功检定都将让作祟损失1动作。

当作祟在打击生物时掷出重击，该生物将被立即传送到30尺内一个未被占据空间内。由作祟选择生物被传送的空间。
Haunted Aiudara.reset: 1分钟后艾厄达拉缚灵便会消散，但作祟会在24小时后重置。

Forceful Screech.name: 力场尖叫 Forceful Screech
Forceful Screech.description:
触发 一个生物走进艾厄达拉30尺内

效果 三个艾厄达拉缚灵齐声尖叫并显形，以保护拱门。30尺内的每个生物必须尝试一次@Check[will|dc:27]豁免。作祟掷骰先攻。

成功 生物不受影响。

失败 生物受到@Damage[(2d8+9)[force]]伤害。

大失败 生物受到4d8+9@Damage[(4d8+9)[force]]伤害并陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{疲乏 Fatigued}状态。

No MAP.description: 力场之手打击无多重攻击减值。
No MAP.name: 无多重攻击减值 No MAP

Haunted Aiudara.disable: @Check[religion|dc:25] (受训) 来驱除其中一个缚灵或@Check[occultism|dc:25] (专家) 来抹除其中一个缚灵的星界记号；要解除作祟必须成功通过三次检定。

Immolis.name: 焚身兽 Immolis
Immolis.publicNotes:
大部分高等有机生命，无论是动物还是植物，都会通过将养料（譬如食物）转化为热量来为身体供能。尽管这一过程对有机体的价值不可估量，但同样也为它们带来了弱点——一个被焚身兽进化出的能力所利用的弱点。

焚身兽是卡斯卓韦星上广泛分布的一种灵能捕食者，尤见于地下或低温环境当中。尽管几乎目盲，但它们却能依靠感知其它生物体散发的热量进行狩猎。当一头焚身兽锁定目标后，它会将其内在的心能聚焦成一股隐形的射线朝猎物发射。这种骤然的能流会导致目标的代谢速率急剧加快，促使该生物体的发热率达到危险量级。这种骤然上升的热效应会字面意义上地将该生物由内而外烤焦——使其内脏爆裂，血液沸腾，以及脂肪燃烧。它们的最终命运不是变成尚有余温的食物，而是炙烤到病态焦糊的佳肴。

焚身兽的基本外形像是浑身覆盖着细小鳞片的蛛行瘦长蛙类。其头部长着猿类的口鼻，嘴唇外翻，露出一对形如鱿鱼的喙。在嘴的上方，有三对鼻孔，在其狩猎时会猛烈地翕动作响。尽管它们步行时移动缓慢，焚身兽却能以惊人的速度攀爬。

与其它许多种基于热能捕食的生物不同，焚身兽出人意料地对火焰有着深深的恐惧，或许这是因为它们了解血肉生命——自然包括它们自己——是多么容易被烧焦。因此，他们倾向于栖居于近水处。然而，这也为它们自己招致了困境，因为它们的热量感知能力很容易由于猎物用某种方式屏蔽自己的热特征而失效，最典型的例子就是躲在水下或雪地下。尽管它们具有足以交流的智能且乐于和同类群居合作，但其它物种在焚身兽眼中要么是食物，要么就是威胁，无论是和其它文明生物进行文化交流还是物质交换，它们都毫无兴趣。焚身兽的平均身高是5尺，重量则是150磅。

Heatsense 120 feet.name: 热量感知120尺
Heatsense 120 feet.description: 焚身兽可以感知到那些身体较周围环境更热的生物，如同具有相同范围的精确感官的效果。那些不发热的生物——譬如许多不死生物或构装体——对焚身兽具有@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]，那些成功掩藏自身发热的生物也一样（譬如将自己浸没在冷水中）。

Heat Beam.name: 热能射线 Heat Beam
Heat Beam.description:
焚身兽指定30尺内的一个活物，朝它发射一道不稳定的灵能射线，使该生物的身体发热量剧增。目标必须尝试一次@Check[fortitude|dc:20]豁免。如果焚身兽在同一轮中第二次或第三次使用热能射线，其DC分别降低至@Check[fortitude|dc:16]或@Check[fortitude|dc:12]。

成功 该生物不受影响。

失败 该生物受到@Damage[(2d6+5)[fire]]伤害。

大失败 该生物受到@Damage[(4d6+5)[fire],5[persistent,fire]]{4d6+5火焰伤害以及5持续火焰伤害}。

Kaneepo the Slim.name: 瘦削者卡涅颇 Kaneepo the Slim

Phasic Defenses.name: 相移防御 Phasic Defenses
Phasic Defenses.description:
需求 卡涅颇自其上一回合开始起还未使用过瘦削步能力

触发 卡涅颇将要从一次攻击中受到伤害

效果 卡涅颇使用瘦削步能力，若在此过程中移动出攻击范围，则不受到该次攻击的任何伤害。

Create Breach.name: 创造裂隙 Create Breach
Create Breach.description: 每日一次，卡涅颇可以撕开位面之间的隔膜结构，创造出从枯瘦之地通向七拱之国某处的传送门。该传送门持续至多1小时，但卡涅颇可以任意地将其关闭。

Shadow Pull.name: 幽影波 Shadow Pull
Shadow Pull.description: @Template[line|distance:60]范围内的所有生物受到卡涅颇的影餮效果影响。

Shadowfeed.name: 影餮 Shadowfeed
Shadowfeed.description:
只要卡涅颇用一次攻击命中了目标生物，卡涅颇剥去的皮肤下露出的血肉条纹将会包裹目标的影子，致使受害者的身体开始枯萎。受影响的生物必须尝试一次@Check[fortitude|dc:21]豁免。

成功 该生物不受影响。

失败 该生物受到@Damage[3d6[mental]]伤害并且陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 1}。

大失败 该生物受到@Damage[6d6[mental]]伤害并且陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 2}。

Slimstep.name: 瘦削步 Slimstep
Slimstep.description:
需求 卡涅颇处于昏暗光照或黑暗中

频率 每轮一次

效果 卡涅颇瞬间将自己从一片阴影转移到另一片。卡涅颇将自己以及自己所持的任何物品传送到30尺内处于昏暗光照或黑暗的空地上。如果这将会将任何其它生物一起携带过去，该能力将会失效。

Mind Reading.name: Mind Reading
Mind Reading.description:
With a cursory mental touch, you attempt to read the target's mind. It must attempt a Will save. The target then becomes temporarily immune to your mind reading for 1 hour.

Critical Success The target perceives vague surface thoughts from you when you Cast the Spell.

Success You find out whether the target's Intelligence modifier is higher than, equal to, or lower than yours.

Failure You perceive vague surface thoughts from the target when you Cast the Spell, and you find out whether its Intelligence modifier is higher than, equal to, or lower than yours.

Critical Failure As failure, and for the duration of the spell, you can Sustain the Spell to detect the target's surface thoughts again. The target doesn't receive any additional saves.

Paralyze.name: Paralyze
Paralyze.description:
You block the target's motor impulses before they can leave its mind, threatening to freeze the target in place. The target must attempt a Will save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}.

Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed} for 1 round.

Critical Failure The target is Paralyzed for 4 rounds. At the end of each of its turns, it can attempt a new Will save to reduce the remaining duration by 1 round, or end it entirely on a critical success.

Heightened (7th) You can target up to 10 creatures.

equipment-Shadewither Key.name: Shadewither Key
equipment-Shadewither Key.description:
This palm-sized talisman hangs on a string of braided bark fibers. It resembles a leaf from some unknown tree similar to oak, carved from jade and then dipped halfway into black ink that looks wet despite feeling completely dry. The gate key was originally created to open the aiudara known as the Seventh Arch. In recent years, corrupting magic has given it additional, stranger powers.

When you wear and invest the Shadewither Key, shadows gather around you. You gain a +1 item bonus to Stealth checks. However, this boon comes with great risk: any elf who touches the Shadewither Key is immediately afflicted with the obnubilate curse (see below).

Activate 2 Interact

Effect You touch the Shadewither Key and command the shadows it casts around you to peel away. The shadows form an umbral double that resembles you in every way except for its fiery red eyes and the expression of wicked delight on its face. The double occupies the same space as you and attempts to intercept any attacks aimed at you. A creature must succeed at a @Check[flat|dc:11] when targeting you with an attack, spell, or other effect; on a failure, they hit the shadowy double instead of you. The effect lasts for 1 minute or until the double is hit, whichever comes first. Once the double is hit, it's destroyed. As long as the double exists, you don't gain the Shadewither Key's item bonus to Stealth checks.

Destruction The Shadewither Key's magic can be destroyed by exposing the artifact to uncontained teleportation energies. If touched to an unlinked or malfunctioning aiudara, the Shadewither Key causes the gate to connect to a new counterpart. If this happens, the key's magic leaves it, rendering the item useless.

Obnubilate Curse

Only elves can be afflicted with this magical curse; other creatures are immune. An elf who touches the Shadewither Key must save against the curse. Victims quickly fall @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious}; then, over several days, they slowly blacken and shrivel like rotting fruit until they die. The corpse of an elf killed by the obnubilate curse is dry and charcoal-like; it collapses into ash at the slightest touch.

Saving Throw @Check[fortitude|dc:27|traits:curse,enchantment,incapacitation,magical,mental,shadow|overrideTraits:true]

Onset 1 minute

Stage 1 unconscious and @Damage[3d6[mental]] (1 day)

Stage 2 unconscious and @Damage[6d6[mental]] (2 days)

Stage 3 unconscious and @Damage[6d6[mental]] (2 days)

Stage 4 unconscious and @Damage[6d6[mental]], permanent loss of most recent year of memory (1 day)

Stage 5 unconscious and @Damage[6d6[mental]], permanent loss of all memory (1 day)

Stage 6 death.

Kareq.name: 卡菈克鸣爆虫 Kareq

Boomstrike.name: 爆鸣打击 Boomstrike
Boomstrike.description:
卡菈克鸣爆虫用自己的下肢击打自己的回声腔，创造一道足以点燃四周空气的噪鸣爆。卡菈克鸣爆虫选择@Template[cone|distance:30]（且造成音波伤害）或@Template[line|distance:60]（且造成火焰伤害）。受波及的生物必须尝试一次@Check[fortitude|dc:21]豁免检定。

成功 该生物不受伤害。

失败 该生物受到@Damage[3d6[fire]]或@Damage[3d6[sonic]]的伤害。

大失败 该生物受到@Damage[6d6[fire]]或@Damage[6d6[sonic]]的伤害且在1分钟内陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{耳聋 Deafened}（若选择音波伤害）或受到@Damage[1d6[persistent,fire]] 伤害（若选择火焰伤害）。

Kareq.publicNotes:
卡菈克鸣爆虫看起来像是恐龙和昆虫的杂交体。它的躯干向后延展呈一个蚂蚁般的球状腹腔。

卡菈克鸣爆虫的身体下方有一个谐振腔，当其将腿部肌肉朝腹部收紧时，产生的压强将会在腔体内引发声波放大，随后通过卡菈克鸣爆虫的口腔聚焦并释放出一阵噪鸣爆。音波产生的剧震可以轻易杀人于无形。

卡菈克鸣爆虫被认为与格拉利昂的暗音盲怪有某种关联，尽管它们的共性可能仅仅只是进化收敛的结果。与强壮的地下生物暗音盲怪不同，卡菈克鸣爆虫生存于许多不同的环境，主要分布的区域则是雨林和森林地带。有些肤色如沙的亚种分布在蚁居地的沙漠当中，它们被这里的弗米蚁族当做是一种高贵的魔兽，甚至在某些情况下是具有神圣性的。

卡菈克鸣爆虫倾向于独自狩猎，它们勇敢无畏，甚至常常会去狩猎那些体型远大于自己的其它捕食者。在战斗中它们一开始会保持距离，利用音爆削弱敌人后再近身接战，用利爪撕碎它们。

尽管它们通常不会将人口稠密的地区选做狩猎场，但卡菈克鸣爆虫自身却有着强烈的领地意识，它们甚至会特意占据那些会导致与类人生物发生冲突的高耸地标建筑。这是因为在发情期，卡菈克鸣爆虫会寻找高地，爬上高山，巨岩，或者——如果幸运女神不青睐一片聚居地——塔楼和其他建筑。在其顶端，它们会爆发出寻求配偶的鸣响，其传播范围可以广及数十里。

通常的卡菈克鸣爆虫足至肩有5尺高，头至尾则有10尺长，其重量约300磅。

Mindhammer Mushrooms.name: 心灵铁锤菇 Mindhammer Mushrooms
Mindhammer Mushrooms.disable: @Check[survival|dc:20] (受训) 以寻出一条不会触发蘑菇的安全路径
Mindhammer Mushrooms.hazarddescription: 蘑菇放射出强大的心能爆发，用使人精疲力竭的幻景击垮周围潜在的捕食者。
Mindhammer Mushrooms.reset: 蘑菇群必须休息24小时才能发射下一次心能爆发。
Mindhammer Mushrooms.stealthdetails: (受训) 以注意到蘑菇下方的小动物骸骨

Psychic Blast.name: 心能爆发 Psychic Blast
Psychic Blast.description:
触发 一名生物踩过蘑菇群

效果 蘑菇群释放出一道充斥着心能的嗡鸣。触发生物受到@Damage[(2d8+8)[mental]]伤害（@Check[will|dc:23|basic]豁免）。若掷出大失败，该生物陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{疲乏 Fatigued}。

Oaksteward Enforcer.name: 橡树家宰执法者 Oaksteward Enforcer

Wild Shape.name: 荒野形态 Wild Shape
Wild Shape.description:
频率 每天一次

效果 橡树家宰的双手在一分钟内变为狂野利爪。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.lBpprC8VD4GRzTtg]{效果：荒野形态-橡树家宰}

equipment-Staff.description: This long piece of wood can aid in walking and deliver a mighty blow.
equipment-Staff.name: Staff

Ray of Frost.name: Ray of Frost
Ray of Frost.description:
You blast an icy ray. Make a spell attack roll. The ray deals 2d4 cold damage.

Critical Success The target takes double damage and takes a -10-foot status penalty to its Speeds for 1 round.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.I4PsUAaYSUJ8pwKC]{Spell Effect: Ray of Frost}

Success The target takes normal damage.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d4.

Light.name: Light
Light.description:
The object glows, casting bright light in a 20-foot radius (and dim light for the next 20 feet) like a torch. If you cast this spell again on a second object, the light spell on the first object ends.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.cVVZXNbV0nElVOPZ]{Spell Effect: Light}

Heightened (4th) The object sheds bright light in a 60-foot radius (and dim light for the next 60 feet).

Magic Fang.name: Magic Fang
Magic Fang.description:
Choose one of the target's unarmed attacks. You cause that unarmed attack to shine with primal energy. The unarmed attack becomes a +1 striking unarmed attack, gaining a +1 item bonus to attack rolls and increasing the number of damage dice to two if it had only one.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.MqZ6FScbfGtXB8tt]{Spell Effect: Runic Body}

equipment-Dagger.name: Dagger
equipment-Dagger.description: This small, bladed weapon is held in one hand and used to stab a creature in close combat. It can also be thrown.

Shillelagh.name: Shillelagh
Shillelagh.description:
The target grows vines and leaves, brimming with primal energy. The target becomes a +1 striking weapon while in your hands, gaining a +1 item bonus to attack rolls and increasing the number of weapon damage dice to two. Additionally, as long as you are on your home plane, attacks you make with the target against aberrations, extraplanar creatures, and undead increase the number of weapon damage dice to three.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.deG1dtfuQph03Kkg]{Spell Effect: Shillelagh}

Stabilize.name: Stabilize
Stabilize.description: Vitality energy shuts death's door. The target loses the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{Dying} condition, though it remains @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious} at 0 Hit Points.

Tanglefoot.name: Tanglefoot
Tanglefoot.description:
A vine covered in sticky sap appears from thin air, flicking from your hand and lashing itself to the target. Attempt a spell attack against the target.

Critical Success The target gains the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} condition and takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds for 1 round. It can attempt to Escape against your spell DC to remove the penalty and the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} condition.

Success The target takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds for 1 round. It can attempt to Escape against your spell DC to remove the penalty.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.TwtUIEyenrtAbeiX]{Spell Effect: Tangle Vine}

Failure The target is unaffected.

Heightened (2nd) The effects last for 2 rounds.

Heightened (4th) The effects last for 1 minute.

equipment-Leather Armor.name: Leather Armor
equipment-Leather Armor.description: A mix of flexible and molded boiled leather, a suit of this type of armor provides some protection with maximum flexibility.

Wild Shape.name: Wild Shape
Wild Shape.description:
频率 每天一次

效果 The Oaksteward's hands transform into wild claws for 1 minute.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.lBpprC8VD4GRzTtg]{Effect: Wild Shape (Oaksteward)}

equipment-Staff.description: This long piece of wood can aid in walking and deliver a mighty blow.

equipment-Heavy Crossbow.name: Heavy Crossbow
equipment-Heavy Crossbow.description: This large crossbow is harder to load and more substantial than a regular crossbow, but it packs a greater punch.

equipment-Bolts.name: Bolts
equipment-Bolts.description: Shorter than traditional arrows but similar in construction, bolts are the ammunition used by crossbows.

Ocluai.name: 幽惧枭猿 Ocluai
Ocluai.languages: 无法说任何语言；心灵感应100尺，仅限图像

Lost in the Dark.name: 暗夜迷途 Lost in the Dark
Lost in the Dark.description:
60 feet. An ocluai's presence distorts nearby creatures' senses of direction. Nonmagical bright light within the aura becomes dim light, and nonmagical dim light with the aura becomes darkness. Any non-gorga within range of the ocluai's aura that attempts to move must declare where they intend to move. Before moving, however, the creature must attempt a secret @Check[will|dc:20] saving throw. An ocluai can exempt specific creatures from this effect. Magical light anywhere within the ocluai's aura increases the light level as normal and reduces the Will save DC by 5.

Success The creature moves normally.

Failure The creature moves the intended distance, but not in the right direction. The ocluai chooses the creature's destination and route, which could be a straight line or could include multiple changes in direction. If the path is blocked or would go through obviously dangerous terrain (such as of a cliff or through a fire), the movement ends before the blockage or danger.

Critical Failure As failure, but if the creature's path would lead them into obviously dangerous terrain, they must succeed at a second Will save to end their movement just before they would enter the danger.

Corner of the Eye.name: 惊恐一瞥 Corner of the Eye
Corner of the Eye.description: 幽惧枭猿创造出一道令人不安的幻觉冲击，范围为以距离60尺内一点为中心的@Template[burst|distance:10]。被这次幻觉冲击命中的任何生物将会在自己的眼角的余光中看到令人惊恐的幻视，譬如被蛆虫啃食的尸体或是作势欲扑的恐怖怪兽，从而受到@Damage[3d6[mental]]伤害（@Check[will|dc:20|basic]豁免）。

Ocluai.publicNotes:
幽惧枭猿是身处黑暗所产生的迷失，无助以及无端恐惧的化身。一头幽惧枭猿的灰色身体由带有锯齿状喙的无毛恶枭的上半身，猿猴一般的双腿，以及充盈着幽影的巨大眼眶组成。环绕在幽惧枭猿身边那非自然的黑暗场域将使得大部分生物茫然无措，失去方向感；尽管其它夜餮精们都擅于迅速接近猎物并享受杀戮，幽惧枭猿却喜欢栖息于低矮的枝条或横梁上，用它空洞的神情注视着猎物屈从于惊惧。尽管正面战斗能力同样不俗，但幽惧枭猿更倾向于静静等待，袭击那些在慌不择路的奔逃中进入攻击范围的可怜虫，放任这些猎物自身的恐惧驱使它们堕入深渊或是崩溃屈服。

幽惧枭猿能够理解几种语言，但很少会与非精类沟通。当它们进行交流的形式十分特殊。当幽惧枭猿凝视一名同伴时，携带信息的一系列紊乱的心灵感应图像将会直接被投射进目标的脑海当中。

夜餮精是一种昼行动物对于黑暗的恐惧所孕育的精类化身。作为暗影与饥渴的 造物，它们热衷于捕食那些生于光明的活物。世上存在着许多不同种类的夜餮精，而每一种都是黑夜中那些数不胜数的恐惧化身而成。

夜餮精在第一世界的幽夜堡国度中十分常见，它们曾在这里受到传说中的莱诺克伯爵所驱使。在莱诺克消失以后，夜餮精们失去了它们曾拥有的最后一丝怜悯，分散成由那些最强壮个体所领导的小猎群，开始狩猎所能找到的一切精类。所有的夜餮精都缭绕着幽影的面纱，并且大部分都对日光感到不适，因而更乐于躲在幽夜堡永恒的阴沉之中直到夜幕降临。它们诡异的双眼——灌满了魔法幽影的空洞——赋予了它们哪怕在魔法黑暗中也能视物的能力。

Poisonous Atmosphere.name: 剧毒大气 Poisonous Atmosphere
Poisonous Atmosphere.disable: @Check[survival|dc:20] (受训) 或神秘 (受训) 以呼吸装在袋中或布中的安全空气。
Poisonous Atmosphere.hazarddescription: 阿克腾的有毒魔法大气对星球上的活物有着怪异的影响。
Poisonous Atmosphere.routine: (1动作；幻术系，心灵，异能) 大气继续影响区域内的所有生物，需要在每轮为剧毒大气进行一次新的强韧豁免检定。一名屏住呼吸的生物对该豁免具有+2环境加值。
Poisonous Atmosphere.stealthdetails: (专家) 以确认突如其来的呕吐感的源头

Poisonous Atmosphere.name: 剧毒大气 Poisonous Atmosphere
Poisonous Atmosphere.description:
触发 一名非原生生物呼吸星球的大气

效果 触发生物必须尝试一次@Check[fortitude|dc:17]豁免。为本危害掷先攻。

大成功 该生物在呼吸大气后发现自己精力充沛，并进入1轮的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{迅捷 Quickened}。

成功 该生物不受影响。

失败 该生物陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 1}。

大失败 该生物陷入1轮的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{困惑 Confused}。

Construct Armor (Hardness 4).description: 与普通物品一样，采矿构装体也具有硬度。其硬度将会使其受到的任何伤害减少等同于硬度的数值。一旦采矿构装体的生命值被减少到一半以下，或是当其受到一次重击的伤害后，它的构装护甲就会破损并使其AC减少至14。
Construct Armor (Hardness 4).name: 构装护甲 Construct Armor (硬度 4)

equipment-Warhammer.name: Warhammer
equipment-Warhammer.description: This weapon has a wooden shaft ending in a large, heavy metal head. The head of the hammer might be single-sided or double-sided, but it's always capable of delivering powerful bludgeoning blows.

Reservoir Trap.name: 贮水陷阱 Reservoir Trap
Reservoir Trap.hazarddescription: 无数管道从一座加压水箱中延伸出来，随时可能对无防备的通行者射出足以剜皮削骨的喷流。

Violent Deluge.name: 残暴泄洪 Violent Deluge
Violent Deluge.description:
触发 水箱破裂或被毁

效果 从破损水箱中喷涌而出的奔流狂潮席卷四周，对周围15尺的所有生物造成@Damage[3d8[bludgeoning]]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:22]豁免）。该陷阱随后失效。

No MAP.name: 无多重攻击减值 No MAP

Water Jets.name: 巨大喷流 Water Jets
Water Jets.description:
触发 一名角色踏入该房间的地面空间

效果 水管上的密封装置爆裂开来，朝随机方向喷射出高压水流。此危害使用巨大喷流打击触发生物。为此危害投先攻。

Reservoir Trap.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:18] (受训) 以安全地刺破一条管道以泄压，或@Check[engineering-lore|dc:16]{DC16工程学识} (受训) 以找到并启动泄压阀门；解除该陷阱需要总计三次利用管道或阀门泄压
Reservoir Trap.routine: (3动作) 每有一根水管被毁或被解除，此陷阱失去1动作。此陷阱每有1动作，就对房间内的一个随机生物进行一次巨大喷流打击。
Reservoir Trap.reset: 陷阱在5轮后停止。直到贮水器重新注满为止无法再次触发，这一过程平均需要5日。
Reservoir Trap.stealthdetails: (受训); @Check[perception|dc:19] (专家) 以察觉水箱在极端压强下的鼓胀

Rushing Wind.name: 呼啸之风 Rushing Wind
Rushing Wind.hazarddescription: 一道道狂号的强风将所有生物朝着艾厄达拉所在的区域吸扯。
Rushing Wind.routine:
(1动作) 本危害用该动作将每个生物（除古冢尸妖外）吸引向艾厄达拉。每个受影响的生物必须尝试一次@Check[fortitude|dc:18]豁免。

成功 该生物不受影响。

失败 该生物被朝艾厄达拉拉近5尺并且陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 1}。如果该生物已经邻接艾厄达拉，则不会移动但改为陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 2}。

大失败 该生物被朝艾厄达拉拉近10尺并且陷入震慑1。如果该生物已经邻接艾厄达拉，则不会移动但改为@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}且陷入震慑2。
Rushing Wind.stealthdetails: (受训) 以察觉气压的变化

Gale.name: 狂风呼啸 Gale
Gale.description:
触发 艾厄达拉出现在伊奥克斯上

效果 迸射的狂风将陷入世界叠加态的角色们拉向拱门。为本危害投先攻。

Rushing Wind.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:20] (受训) 或奥法 (受训) 以意识到现象的本质并创造一道补丁堵住传送门里逸出的空气。

Sacred Geyser.name: 神圣喷泉 Sacred Geyser
Sacred Geyser.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:21] (受训) 以制造一种能够间接从安全距离取水的装置。
Sacred Geyser.hazarddescription: 沸腾泉水的喷流朝任何试图从绿洲中采水的角色激射而出。
Sacred Geyser.reset: 该陷阱自动重置，并且会自动适应先前采用过的规避危害方法，这意味着每次重置都需要一次新的检定来解除该陷阱。

Sacred Geyser.name: 沸腾喷涌 Sacred Geyser
Sacred Geyser.description:
触发 一名生物试图用容器或其它方式从绿洲当中取水

效果 含有魔法的沸腾泉水朝着触发生物喷溅而出，并影响目标邻接5尺内的全部生物。被喷溅到的生物受到@Damage[(2d10+13)[fire]]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:23]豁免）。

Scholar's Bane.name: 学者之灾 Scholar's Bane
Scholar's Bane.hazarddescription: 幻术系魔力凝聚出一股统御性的灵能冲击那些较为聪慧生物的心灵，迫使他们在幻象中重新体验自己每一次在才智上的失败以及随之而来的耻辱。
Scholar's Bane.reset: 该陷阱能够生效10轮，且其激活轮次不必连续，在激活轮次达到上限后必须经过24小时才能再次充能。
Scholar's Bane.stealthdetails: (受训) 以注意到隐藏在其中四座浮雕眼中的魔法传感器
Scholar's Bane.routine: (4动作) 本陷阱使用每个动作指定房间内的一个智力属性为10或更高的生物。该生物必须成功通过一次@Check[will|dc:22]豁免否则受到@Damage[(2d8+2)[mental]]伤害。若掷出大失败，该生物由于被失败所扰而步履蹒跚，其速度在1分钟内受到-10尺状态减值。每有一颗雕像眼球被毁或被解除，该陷阱失去1动作。

Reveal Failure.name: 揭开伤疤 Reveal Failure
Reveal Failure.description:
触发 一名智力属性为10或更高的生物进入房间

效果 该陷阱使得目标生物的脑中充斥着羞耻的回忆。该生物必须成功通过一次@Check[will|dc:22]豁免否则受到@Damage[(2d8+2)[mental]]伤害。为本陷阱投先攻。

Scholar's Bane.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:22] (trained) to carve out one eye sensor, @Check[arcana|dc:22] or @Check[occultism|dc:22] (trained) to blank out one's mind (disables trap for self only), or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} (2nd level; counteract DC 20) to counteract one eye sensor

Shadow Guards.name: 幽影守卫 Shadow Guards

Shadow Rush.name: 幽影急袭 Shadow Rush
Shadow Rush.description:
触发 一名生物进入房间

效果 在延迟1轮后，陷阱激活其中的条状暗影人形，并对房间内的每名生物进行一次绘矛打击。为该陷阱投先攻。

Shadow Guards.disable: @Check[acrobatics|dc:16] 以在不触发符文的情况下通过房间，随后@Check[thievery|dc:18] (受训) 以在不触发陷阱的情况下将符文从木头上切下；或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{解除魔法 Dispel Magic} (1环级；反制DC 16) 以反制这些符文。
Shadow Guards.hazarddescription: 幽影编织出的怪诞精灵人像从地面上将自己剥离出来，对房间里的所有人发起攻击。
Shadow Guards.routine: (1动作) 画中幽影对房间里的每名角色用尖锐线条画出的长矛进行戳刺。
Shadow Guards.reset: 该陷阱在1分钟后失效并重置。画中幽影无法追逐逃出房间的角色。
Shadow Guards.stealthdetails: (受训) 以注意到隐藏在涂鸦之下的符文

Shadowshift Field.name: 诡影移形场域 Shadowshift Field
Shadowshift Field.reset: 该效应持续1天，随后结束并且直到再次举行仪式为止无法再次触发。
Shadowshift Field.stealthdetails: (受训) 以注意到空气与植物处于摆动游移的状态

Shadowshift.name: 诡影移形 Shadowshift
Shadowshift.description:
触发 一名角色进入了受侵染的区域

效果 场域内的位面扭曲度激增，充斥着整片林间空地，为此危害投先攻。

Shadowshift Field.hazarddescription: 橡树家宰叛党的仪式引起的跨位面渗透造成了暗影扭曲效应，对林间空地里所有的活物造成损伤。
Shadowshift Field.routine:
(1动作) 由于位面扭曲会在活体内部撕开大量微创，空地内的每个生物必须尝试一次@Check[fortitude|dc:17] 豁免。精类，植物生物和德鲁伊不受影响。

大成功 该生物不受影响，并且在24小时内临时对此效果免疫。土地上充盈的原能魔力还会治疗[[/br 1d6]]生命值。

成功 该生物不受影响，并且在24小时内临时对此效果免疫。

失败 该生物受到@Damage[(1d6+3)[force]]伤害。

大失败 该生物受到@Damage[(2d6+6)[force]]伤害。
Shadowshift Field.disable: @Check[arcana|dc:17] (受训) 以请求物质位面的影响降临，稳定此区域的实存性并在1小时内使该危害无效化，或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{解除魔法 Dispel Magic} (1环级；反制DC 15) 以永久性终止该效应。

Symbiotic Amoeba.name: Symbiotic Amoeba
Symbiotic Amoeba.description: 由@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.gatewalkers-bestiary.Actor.7VoxPNp1BMlhGrss]{风琴蜗牛 Amelekana}产生的共生原虫是一种超小型的，无心智的半独立生物，由风琴蜗牛所控制。它具有仆从特征，AC为15，生命值为1，且与风琴蜗牛具有相同的技能和豁免。每一轮，风琴蜗牛可以使用指挥仆从来命令一只共生原虫快步或游泳20尺并且进行一次伪足打击（近战 伪足 +13，伤害 2d4 酸蚀）。如果宿主风琴蜗牛死亡，与它共生的原虫会全部由于其宿主的精神反冲而死。一头风琴蜗牛同时最多拥有三只共生原虫存在。

Temagyr.name: 漩影猎犬 Temagyr

Cloak of Shadows.name: Cloak of Shadows
Cloak of Shadows.description: Temagyrs are constantly surrounded by shifting shadows. A temagyr can always Hide in dim light or darkness.

Shadow Bite.name: Shadow Bite
Shadow Bite.description:
频率 once per round

效果 The temagyr attempts to tear away and swallow a gobbet of shadow from a creature within reach. The creature must attempt a @Check[fortitude|dc:17] save.

成功 The target takes no damage.

失败 The target takes @Damage[(1d4+4)[piercing]] and the temagyr gains 2 temporary Hit Points for 1 minute.

大失败 The target takes @Damage[(2d4+8)[piercing]] and the temagyr gains 4 temporary Hit Points for 1 minute.

Umbral Leap.name: Umbral Leap
Umbral Leap.description:
频率 每天一次

效果 The temagyr bends light and darkness to leap into a creature's shadow. The temagyr targets a creature that it can see who is in dim or brighter light within 120 feet. The temagyr teleports to a space adjacent to the target creature.

Temagyr.publicNotes:
漩影猎犬是对夜行掠食者恐惧的化身——它们是潜行于暗夜的捕猎者，等候着猎物最虚弱的时刻发起致命一击。由于它们融入阴影以及在其间穿梭的能力往往能够惊骇那些受害者，漩影猎犬十分乐于采取伏击战术。

漩影猎犬通常身长8尺，重500磅但却能极不自然的如流体般优雅移动。伴随它们的幽影看起来悬浮在其身后的空气之中。在战斗中，一头漩影猎犬可以轻松地通过进攻肉体或是撕咬影子的方式来击倒目标。这些影子伤口直到彻底治愈都会十分明显，而物质位面的医生或研究人员都对其束手无策；一具漩影猎犬受害者的尸体可能表面上完好无损，只有那被撕扯得支离破碎的影子能表明这可怜虫究竟是如何走向了自己命运的终点。

夜餮精是一种昼行动物对于黑暗的恐惧所孕育的精类化身。作为暗影与饥渴的 造物，它们热衷于捕食那些生于光明的活物。世上存在着许多不同种类的夜餮精，而每一种都是黑夜中那些数不胜数的恐惧化身而成。

夜餮精在第一世界的幽夜堡国度中十分常见，它们曾在这里受到传说中的莱诺克伯爵所驱使。在莱诺克消失以后，夜餮精们失去了它们曾拥有的最后一丝怜悯，分散成由那些最强壮个体所领导的小猎群，开始狩猎所能找到的一切精类。所有的夜餮精都缭绕着幽影的面纱，并且大部分都对日光感到不适，因而更乐于躲在幽夜堡永恒的阴沉之中直到夜幕降临。它们诡异的双眼——灌满了魔法幽影的空洞——赋予了它们哪怕在魔法黑暗中也能视物的能力。

The Looksee Man.name: 通览者 The Looksee Man

equipment-Ring With Nethys Mask Sigil.name: 带有内希斯面具魔符的戒指 Ring With Nethys Mask Sigil

Shadow Blending.name: 混入幽影 Shadow Blending
Shadow Blending.description: 当通览者由于昏暗光照而获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}时，锁定他所需的纯骰检定的DC为@Check[flat|dc:7]，而非5。

Shadow Stride.name: 幽影行走 Shadow Stride
Shadow Stride.description:
需求 通览者处于昏暗光照中

效果 通览者进行一次行走。他在本次行走过程中，速度获得+10状态加值，且混入幽影提高的纯骰DC变为@Check[flat|dc:11]，此外，直到本次移动结束为止，通览者处于昏暗光照的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}状态，即使他在行走过程中离开了昏暗光照的区域。

Stalk Goggles Specialist.name: 肉柄目镜专家 Stalk Goggles Specialist
Stalk Goggles Specialist.description: 只要佩戴着高等肉柄目镜，通览者就无法被等级4或以下的生物夹击。

Acid Arrow.name: Acid Arrow
Acid Arrow.description:
You conjure an arrow of acid that keeps corroding the target after it hits. Make a spell attack against the target. On a hit, you deal 3d8 acid damage plus @Damage[(floor(@item.rank/2))d6[persistent,acid]] damage. On a critical hit, double the initial damage, but not the persistent damage.

Heightened (+2) The initial damage increases by 2d8, and the persistent acid damage increases by 1d6.

Scorching Ray.name: Scorching Ray
Scorching Ray.description:
You fire a ray of heat and flame. Make a spell attack roll against a single creature. On a hit, the target takes 2d6 fire damage, and on a critical hit, the target takes double damage.

For each additional action you use when Casting the Spell, you can fire an additional ray at a different target, to a maximum of three rays targeting three different targets for 3 actions. These attacks each increase your multiple attack penalty, but you don't increase your multiple attack penalty until after you make all the spell attack rolls for scorching ray. If you spend 2 or more actions Casting the Spell, the damage increases to 4d6 fire damage on a hit, and it still deals double damage on a critical hit.

Heightened (+1) The damage to each target increases by 1d6 for the 1-action version, or by 2d6 for the 2-action and 3-action versions.

Mage Hand.name: Mage Hand
Mage Hand.description:
You create a single magical hand, either invisible or ghostlike, that grasps the target object and moves it slowly up to 20 feet. Because you're levitating the object, you can move it in any direction. When you Sustain the Spell, you can move the object an additional 20 feet. If the object is in the air when the spell ends, the object falls.

Heightened (3rd) You can target an unattended object with a Bulk of 1 or less.

Heightened (5th) The range increases to 60 feet, and you can target an unattended object with a Bulk of 1 or less.

Heightened (7th) The range increases to 60 feet, and you can target an unattended object with a Bulk of 2 or less.

Magic Missile.name: Magic Missile
Magic Missile.description:
You send a dart of force streaking toward a creature that you can see. It automatically hits and deals 1d4+1 force damage. For each additional action you use when Casting the Spell, increase the number of missiles you shoot by one, to a maximum of three missiles for 3 actions. You choose the target for each missile individually. If you shoot more than one missile at the same target, combine the damage before applying bonuses or penalties to damage, resistances, weaknesses, and so forth.

Heightened (+2) You shoot one additional missile with each action you spend.

Physical Boost.name: Physical Boost
Physical Boost.description:
You temporarily improve the target's physique. The target gains a +2 status bonus to the next Acrobatics check, Athletics check, Fortitude save, or Reflex save it attempts.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.XT3AyRfx4xeXfAjP]{Spell Effect: Physical Boost}

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.description:
You raise a magical shield of force. This counts as using the Raise a Shield action, giving you a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn, but it doesn't require a hand to use.

While the spell is in effect, you can use the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.jM72TjJ965jocBV8]{Shield Block} reaction with your magic shield. The shield has Hardness 5. After you use Shield Block, the spell ends and you can't cast it again for 10 minutes. Unlike a normal Shield Block, you can use the spell's reaction against the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gKKqvLohtrSJj3BM]{Force Barrage} spell.

Heightening the spell increases the shield's Hardness.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.Jemq5UknGdMO7b73]{Spell Effect: Shield}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.QF6RDlCoTvkVHRo4]{Effect: Shield Immunity}

Heightened (3rd) The shield has Hardness 10.

Heightened (5th) The shield has Hardness 15.

Heightened (7th) The shield has Hardness 20.

Heightened (9th) The shield has Hardness 25.

Shocking Grasp.name: Shocking Grasp
Shocking Grasp.description:
You shroud your hands in a crackling field of lightning. Make a melee spell attack roll. On a hit, the target takes 2d12 electricity damage. If the target is wearing metal armor or is made of metal, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your attack roll with shocking grasp, and the target also takes @Damage[(1d4+((@item.level)-1))[persistent,electricity]] damage on a hit. On a critical hit, double the initial damage, but not the persistent damage.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d12, and the persistent electricity damage increases by 1.

Tanglefoot.name: Tanglefoot
Tanglefoot.description:
A vine covered in sticky sap appears from thin air, flicking from your hand and lashing itself to the target. Attempt a spell attack against the target.

Critical Success The target gains the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} condition and takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds for 1 round. It can attempt to Escape against your spell DC to remove the penalty and the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} condition.

Success The target takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds for 1 round. It can attempt to Escape against your spell DC to remove the penalty.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.TwtUIEyenrtAbeiX]{Spell Effect: Tangle Vine}

Failure The target is unaffected.

Heightened (2nd) The effects last for 2 rounds.

Heightened (4th) The effects last for 1 minute.

Spider Climb.name: Spider Climb
Spider Climb.description:
Tiny clinging hairs sprout across the creature's hands and feet, offering purchase on nearly any surface. The target gains a climb Speed equal to its Speed.

Heightened (5th) The duration increases to 1 hour.

Illusory Disguise.name: Illusory Disguise
Illusory Disguise.description:
You create an illusion that causes you to appear as another creature of the same body shape, and with roughly similar height (within 6 inches) and weight (within 50 pounds), as yourself. The disguise is typically good enough to hide your identity, but not to impersonate a specific individual. The spell doesn't change your voice, scent, or mannerisms. You can change the appearance of your clothing and worn items, such as making your armor look like a dress. Held items are unaffected, and any worn item you remove returns to its true appearance.

Casting illusory disguise counts as setting up a disguise for the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.action-macros.Macro.k5nW4jGyXD0Oq9LR]{Impersonate} use of Deception; it ignores any circumstance penalties you might take for disguising yourself as a dissimilar creature, it gives you a +4 status bonus to Deception checks to prevent others from seeing through your disguise, and you add your level even if you're untrained. You can Dismiss this spell.

Heightened (2nd) The spell also disguises your voice and scent, and it gains the auditory and olfactory traits.

Heightened (3rd) You can appear as any creature of the same size, even a specific individual. You must have seen an individual to take on their appearance. The spell also disguises your voice and scent, and it gains the auditory and olfactory traits.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.3Ktyd5F9lOPo4myk]{Spell Effect: Illusory Disguise}

equipment-Dagger.name: Dagger
equipment-Dagger.description: This small, bladed weapon is held in one hand and used to stab a creature in close combat. It can also be thrown.

equipment-Padded Armor.name: Padded Armor
equipment-Padded Armor.description: This armor is simply a layer of heavy, quilted cloth, but it is sometimes used because it's so inexpensive. Padded armor is easier to damage and destroy than other types of armor. Heavy armor comes with a padded armor undercoat included in its Price, though it loses the comfort trait when worn under heavy armor. You can wear just that padded armor or undercoat to sleep in, if your heavy armor is destroyed, or when otherwise not wearing the full heavy armor. This allows you to keep the armor invested and benefit from the power of any runes on the associated heavy armor, but no one else can wear your heavy armor without the padded undercoat.

equipment-Stalk Goggles (Greater).name: Stalk Goggles (Greater)
equipment-Stalk Goggles (Greater).description:
These black leather goggle frames have no lenses. Instead, when a character puts them on and invests them, the wearer's eyes transform and lengthen into snail-like eyestalks. The wobbly eyestalks stretch out through the lens holes and up over the wearer's head on lengthened optic nerves.

Activate 1 envision

Frequency once per day

Effect By focusing hard, you can watch for enemies in all directions. You gain all-around vision and a +1 item bonus to Perception checks involving sight for 1 minute; during this time, you can't be flanked.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.kyLLXUQ9zSEvC4py]{Effect: Stalk Goggles (Greater)}

equipment-Spellbook.name: Spellbook
equipment-Spellbook.description:
A spellbook holds the written knowledge necessary to learn and prepare various spells, a necessity for wizards (who typically get one for free) and a useful luxury for other spellcasters looking to learn additional spells. Each spellbook can hold up to 100 spells. The Price listed is for a blank spellbook.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.f8hRqLJaxBVhF1u0]{Acid Arrow}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.ZxHC7V7HtjUsB8zH]{Blazing Bolt}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.5KobTMrZeZxuXMgl]{Gecko Grip}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gKKqvLohtrSJj3BM]{Force Barrage}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.r3NeUnsgt9mS03Sn]{Shocking Grasp}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.pwzdSlJgYqN7bs2w]{Telekinetic Hand}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.TVKNbcgTee19PXZR]{Shield}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.uZK2BYzPnxUBnDjr]{Tangle Vine}

The Looksee Man.blurb: 男性 窃影鬼 工程师

Barbed Filament.name: 纤丝倒刺 Barbed Filament
Barbed Filament.description:
一名被树渔猴的纤丝倒刺命中的生物将被@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{受擒 Grabbed}。树渔猴可以在有因纤丝倒刺效果被擒抱的生物时进行移动，但会在树渔猴离开该生物60尺后自动解除擒抱。一名受到纤丝擒抱的生物在其回合开始时受到@Damage[5[bleed]]伤害。

树渔猴可以用一个自由动作来切断纤丝，并解除擒抱。纤丝也可以被一次至少造成@Damage[10[slashing]]伤害的打击所切断。但切断纤丝不会被树渔猴本身造成任何伤害。纤丝的AC为17，而@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{逃脱 Escape}DC为19。

树渔猴只有一枚鱼叉；如果纤丝被切断，那么树渔猴会失去本能力以及远程攻击能力，直到1周后其分泌成型一把新鱼叉。

Violet Mister.name: 吐雾紫蕈 Violet Mister
Violet Mister.hazarddescription: 一旦开门拉到绊索，就会导致一株吐雾植物朝着触发生物迎面喷出一团毒云。
Violet Mister.stealthdetails: (受训) 以发觉连在门上的陷阱绊索

Poisoned Welcome.name: 迎宾剧毒 Poisoned Welcome
Poisoned Welcome.description:
触发 一名角色尝试开门

效果 门周围10尺范围内的生物将暴露于紫蕈毒液中。

Violet Venom.name: 紫蕈毒液 Violet Venom
Violet Venom.description:
豁免检定 @Check[fortitude|dc:17];

潜伏期 1分钟;

最大持续时间 6轮;

阶段1 @Damage[1d6[poison]]并且@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1}（1轮）;

阶段2 @Damage[1d6[poison]]并且@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1}（1轮）;

阶段3 @Damage[2d6[poison]]并且力竭1（1轮）

Glimmervine.name: Glimmervine

Camouflage.name: Camouflage
Camouflage.description: The glimmervine can Hide in natural environments even if it doesn't have cover.

Dazzling Blooms.name: Dazzling Blooms
Dazzling Blooms.description:
The glimmervine shakes its iridescent blossoms to astound nearby foes. All creatures within @Template[emanation|distance:30]{30 feet}, except other glimmervines, must attempt a @Check[fortitude|dc:21] save. The glimmervine then can't use Dazzling Blooms for [[/br 1d4 #Recharge Dazzling Blooms]]{1d4 rounds}.

Success The creature is unaffected.

Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} for 1 round.

Critical Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for 1 round, then dazzled for 1 round.

Glimmervine.publicNotes:
Glimmervines are carnivorous creeping vines with sparkling white flowers that open to bloom only at night. They flourish most in high altitudes and cold climates, where they survive by dazzling small prey with their iridescent blossoms before crushing them to death with impossibly strong tendrils. The blood and decomposing flesh of their prey seep into the ground like fertilizer for glimmervines' roots to absorb as nutrients. Because scarps and gulleys caked with gore tend to deter future victims, glimmervines instinctively know not to linger in one spot for long.

Glimmervines are mostly dormant during the day. Clinging to the sides of mountains and cliffs, they're easily mistaken for mundane climbing plants such as ivy or morning glory. When night falls, though, glimmervines' spectacular reflective flowers make their entrancing nature plain for all to see.

Glimmervines are closely related to assassin vines, who employ similar ambush tactics and feeding behaviors, but the former is easily discernible by the shiny white blooms in place of an assassin vine's small red berries. These petals are coated with iridescent veins that absorb sunlight during the day and give off an eerie yet beautiful glow at night. The glistening patina attracts pollinating insects.

On their own, glimmervines don't pose much of a threat to most creatures. Though its root-based sensory organs are formidable in close proximity, a glimmervine can't sense creatures farther than 60 feet away, making escape as easy as getting out of range of their slow movement. The true danger of these plants comes from glimmervine thickets—dense patches of glimmervines that can entangle entire hillsides or ravines. Woe be unto a hapless traveler caught in the midst of a glimmervine thicket at sundown.

Blackfrost Breath.name: Blackfrost Breath
Blackfrost Breath.description: The blackfrost dead gasps sharply, then exhales a mist of dark-blue blackfrost particles in a @Template[emanation|distance:5]. All creatures within the mist become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed}, and all creatures outside the mist become concealed to creatures within it. The mist persists for 1 minute. A creature that ends its turn in the mist is exposed to blackfrost. The blackfrost dead can't use Blackfrost Breath again for [[/br 1d4 #Recharge Blackfrost Breath]]{1d4 rounds}.

Ice Climb 20 feet.name: Ice Climb 20 feet
Ice Climb 20 feet.description: The blackfrost dead can climb on ice as though it had the listed climb Speed. It ignores difficult terrain and greater difficult terrain from ice and snow and doesn't risk falling when crossing ice.

Opportune Bite.name: Opportune Bite
Opportune Bite.description:
Trigger A creature critically fails a Strike within 10 feet of the blackfrost zombie

Effect The blackfrost zombie Steps toward the triggering creature, then makes a jaws Strike against that creature.

Blackfrost.name: Blackfrost
Blackfrost.description:
This affliction can't be reduced below stage 1, nor the damage from it healed, until successfully treated with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.SUKaxVZW2TlM8lu0]{Cleanse Affliction} or a similar effect; the affliction can then be removed as a normal disease. A creature that dies from cold damage while cursed with blackfrost rises as a blackfrost dead after 24 hours. Blackfrost has a counteract rank of 10.

Saving Throw @Check[fortitude|dc:27]

Stage 1 @Damage[4d6[cold]] (1 minute)

Stage 2 weakness to cold 5 and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1} (1 day)

Stage 3 weakness to cold 10 and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2} (1 day)

Blackfrost Zombie.name: Blackfrost Zombie
Blackfrost Zombie.publicNotes:
Most creatures who perish from the cold while cursed with blackfrost rise as zombies. Though mindless, blackfrost zombies are driven by the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible} will of blackfrost to spread their foul curse.

These shambling arctic horrors are dead in name alone. Creatures who succumb to the frigid elements while cursed by blackfrost don't become mere corpses entombed in ice but rather vicious undead capable of spreading the curse of blackfrost even further. Cracked, frostbitten flesh that emits a freezing vapor like steam; inexorable, unhindered strides through feet of ash-blackened snow; a vacant, icy-blue gaze devoid of humanity—the descriptions of blackfrost dead vary by the teller, but none can deny the supernatural dread these monsters evoke.

Blackfrost dead take a variety of forms. Most are mindless, lumbering brutes, largely indiscernible from mundane zombies except for the curse they can inflict. Others not only maintain their presence of mind but wield powers of psychic corruption not unlike those of blackfrost's originator, Osoyo, the Blackfrost Whale. What form a blackfrost dead takes depends primarily on the victim's psychic fortitude and its aptitude for occult magic.

Creating Blackfrost Dead

The simplest way to create a blackfrost dead is to use an existing undead, such as a zombie or a mummy, as your base creature. Replace the creature's abilities with abilities from the list on this page. All blackfrost dead gain the cold trait and have at least one way to inflict blackfrost, often using one of their Strikes.

Curse of the Crown

Blackfrost dead are found only around the Nameless Spires, under which a massive alien being named Osoyo remains imprisoned. Only recently has this ancient being stirred from its slumber, causing blackfrost to foam out of fissures in the ice and afflict unfortunate explorers. The spread of the blackfrost curse has been mercifully slow thus far, but with each creature afflicted, Osoyo's reach expands ever outward.

Elder Thing Researcher.name: Elder Thing Researcher
Elder Thing Researcher.publicNotes:
As one would expect from a species capable of living for thousands of years, many elder things grow more powerful than the standard specimen. Elder thing researchers are among the more frequently encountered of these incredibly rare beings, for their nature and interests often see them traveling to distant worlds to explore and lay the foundations for later conquest and colonization. Elder thing researchers often carry strange weapons or tools that merge technology with magic.

Known by various names on various worlds, but most often as "elder things" or "old ones," these alien creatures are interested in creating lasting works of art, architecture, and even life (such as the legendary and dreaded shoggoth). Matched with their boundless capacity for egotism and enormous life spans, elder things often see themselves as the most learned and advanced species on any planet they visit, and tend to treat most other forms of life like a scientist might treat experimental stock. While not generally inimical or violent, their nature often puts them at odds against other societies they encounter, and war is a time-honored solution. The elder things rarely shy away from using violence to secure their own territory and their perceived right to experiment and explore.

A typical elder thing is 6 feet tall from head to foot, with a 7-foot wingspan. Their bodies are radial in nature, with five wings, five tentacle-like arms that each end in a writhing nest of tendrils, and five eyestalks. At one end of their barrel-shaped bodies are several larger tentacles they use for combat and locomotion, while at the other, at the center of their five eyes in their starfish-shaped heads, sits a single mouth surrounded by multicolored cilia. An elder thing's language is a mix of piping and whistling sounds, but they can vocalize a wide range of other languages as well—albeit with a strange, high-pitched accent.

Space Travelers

An elder thing can travel through outer space via flight, but it doesn't do so at a greater speed than its normal fly Speed. When an elder thing wishes to travel through the void of space, it typically aims itself in the direction it wishes to go, then enters a timed hibernation so that it wakes at a point where it nears its destination.

No Breath.name: No Breath
No Breath.description: The elder thing doesn't breathe and is immune to effects that require breathing (such as inhaled poison).

Eldritch Insight.name: Eldritch Insight
Eldritch Insight.description:
Frequency once per day

Effect By focusing its senses and thoughts on a single concept, an elder thing researcher can draw upon the thousands of years of deep memories. It then selects one of the following skills: Arcana, any Lore, Nature, Religion, or Society. Once the skill is chosen, the elder thing researcher can attempt checks for the selected skill using its Occultism modifier. This effect lasts until the elder thing researcher uses Eldritch Insight again to change its focus. If no focus is predetermined, assume an elder thing researcher has chosen to focus on Library Lore.

Hibernate.name: Hibernate
Hibernate.description: The elder thing enters a state of hibernation after focusing its thoughts for 1 minute. While hibernating, an elder thing is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious}. The elder thing can remain in hibernation as long as it wishes—while hibernating, it doesn't need to eat or drink, nor does it age. Time effectively stands still for a hibernating elder thing. Any effect that would normally rouse an unconscious creature can end an elder thing's hibernation, but the elder thing must attempt a @Check[will|dc:25] save. On a success, the elder thing awakens in [[/br 2d4 #rounds]]{2d4 rounds}; otherwise it takes [[/br 1d4 #days]]{1d4 days} to wake from hibernation. The elder thing can set the length of its hibernation when it enters this state, so that it can awaken after a set amount of time has passed. When awakening in this way, the elder thing does so in only [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}, with no Will save necessary.

Unnatural Flight.name: Unnatural Flight
Unnatural Flight.description: The elder thing's wings allow it to fly in regions where flight is normally impossible, such as outer space. It gains a +2 circumstance bonus to checks made to Maneuver in Flight, and on saving throws against effects that impede flight.

Summon Entity.name: Summon Entity
Summon Entity.description:
You conjure an aberration to fight for you. This works like @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.4YnON9JHYqtLzccu]{Summon Animal}, except you summon a common creature that has the aberration trait and whose level is 5 or lower.

Heightened (6th) Level 7

Heightened (7th) Level 9

Heightened (8th) Level 11

Heightened (9th) Level 13

Heightened (10th) Level 15

Sigil.name: Sigil
Sigil.description:
You harmlessly place your unique magical sigil, which is about 1 square inch in size, on the targeted creature or object. The mark can be visible or invisible, and you can change it from one state to another by using an Interact action to touch the target. The mark can be scrubbed or scraped off with 5 minutes of work. If it's on a creature, it fades naturally over the course of a week. The time before the mark fades increases depending on your heightened level.

Heightened (3rd) The sigil instead fades after 1 month.

Heightened (5th) The sigil instead fades after 1 year.

Heightened (7th) The sigil never fades.

Mind Probe.name: Mind Probe
Mind Probe.description:
You cast your thoughts through a creature's mind, sifting for information. You access the target's memories and knowledge unless it fends you off with a Will save.

Success The target is unaffected.

Failure Each round of the spell's duration, you can Sustain the Spell to ask a different question and attempt to uncover the answer. For each question, the target can attempt a Deception check against your spell DC; if the target succeeds, you don't learn the answer, and on a critical success, the target gives you a false answer that you believe is truthful Once you've asked the target a given question, asking it again, even with a separate casting of mind probe, produces the same result.

Critical Failure As failure, and the target takes a -4 circumstance penalty to Deception checks against your questions.

Black Tentacles.name: Black Tentacles
Black Tentacles.description:
Area 20-foot burst adjacent to a flat surface

Oily black tentacles rise up and attempt to capture creatures in the area. Make spell attack rolls against the Fortitude DC of each creature in the area. Any creature you succeed against is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} and takes 3d6 bludgeoning damage. Whenever a creature ends its turn in the area, the tentacles attempt to grab that creature if they haven't already, and they deal @Damage[1d6[bludgeoning]] damage to any creature already Grabbed.

The tentacles' Escape DC is equal to your spell DC. A creature can attack a tentacle in an attempt to release its grip. Its AC is equal to your spell DC, and it is destroyed if it takes 12 or more damage. Even if destroyed, additional tentacles continue to grow in the area until the duration ends. You can Dismiss the spell.

Modify Memory.name: Modify Memory
Modify Memory.description:
You alter the target's memories, either erasing a memory, enhancing a memory's clarity, altering a memory, or adding a false memory. The target can attempt a Will save to resist the spell.

Critical Success The target is unaffected and realizes you tried to alter its memory.

Success The target is unaffected but thinks your spell was something harmless instead of modify memory, unless it identifies the spell.

Failure During the first 5 minutes of the spell's duration, you can Sustain the Spell to modify a memory once each round. When you do, you imagine up to 6 seconds of memory to modify, to a maximum of 5 continuous minutes of memory.

Any memories you've altered remain changed as long as the spell is active. If the target moves out of range before the 5 minutes is up, you can't alter any further memories.

Heightened (6th) You can cast the spell on a willing target to suppress all memory of a particular topic, detailed in 50 words or fewer. The effect is permanent, and it patches these omissions with an indistinct haze.

Hypercognition.name: Hypercognition
Hypercognition.description: You rapidly catalog and collate information relevant to your current situation. You can instantly use up to 6 Recall Knowledge actions as part of Casting this Spell. For these actions, you can't use any special abilities, reactions, or free actions that trigger when you Recall Knowledge.

Mind Reading.name: Mind Reading
Mind Reading.description:
With a cursory mental touch, you attempt to read the target's mind. It must attempt a Will save. The target then becomes temporarily immune to your mind reading for 1 hour.

Critical Success The target perceives vague surface thoughts from you when you Cast the Spell.

Success You find out whether the target's Intelligence modifier is higher than, equal to, or lower than yours.

Failure You perceive vague surface thoughts from the target when you Cast the Spell, and you find out whether its Intelligence modifier is higher than, equal to, or lower than yours.

Critical Failure As failure, and for the duration of the spell, you can Sustain the Spell to detect the target's surface thoughts again. The target doesn't receive any additional saves.

Daze.name: Daze
Daze.description:
You cloud the target's mind and daze it with a mental jolt. The jolt deals mental damage equal to your spellcasting ability modifier; the target must attempt a basic Will save. If the target critically fails the save, it is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}.

Heightened (+2) The damage increases by 1d6.

Mage Hand.name: Mage Hand
Mage Hand.description:
You create a single magical hand, either invisible or ghostlike, that grasps the target object and moves it slowly up to 20 feet. Because you're levitating the object, you can move it in any direction. When you Sustain the Spell, you can move the object an additional 20 feet. If the object is in the air when the spell ends, the object falls.

Heightened (3rd) You can target an unattended object with a Bulk of 1 or less.

Heightened (5th) The range increases to 60 feet, and you can target an unattended object with a Bulk of 1 or less.

Heightened (7th) The range increases to 60 feet, and you can target an unattended object with a Bulk of 2 or less.

Phantom Pain.name: Phantom Pain
Phantom Pain.description:
Illusory pain wracks the target, dealing 2d4 mental damage and 1d4 persistent mental damage. The target must attempt a Will save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target takes full initial damage but no persistent damage, and the spell ends immediately.

Failure The target takes full initial and persistent damage, and the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1}. If the target recovers from being Sickened, the persistent damage ends and the spell ends.

Critical Failure As failure, but the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2}.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d4 and the persistent damage by 1d4.

@Damage[(@item.level)d4[persistent,mental]]{Scaling Persistent Mental Damage}

Read Aura.name: Read Aura
Read Aura.description:
You focus on the target object, opening your mind to perceive magical auras. When the casting is complete, you know whether that item is magical, and if it is, you learn the school of magic.

If the object is illusory, you detect this only if the effect's level is lower than the rank of your read aura spell.

Heightened (3rd) You can target up to 10 objects.

Heightened (6th) You can target any number of objects.

Telekinetic Projectile.name: Telekinetic Projectile
Telekinetic Projectile.description:
You hurl a loose, unattended object that is within range and that has 1 Bulk or less at the target. Make a spell attack roll against the target. If you hit, you deal bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage-as appropriate for the object you hurled-equal to 1d6 plus your spellcasting ability modifier. No specific traits or magic properties of the hurled item affect the attack or the damage.

Critical Success You deal double damage.

Success You deal full damage.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d6.

Absorb Necromancy.name: Absorb Necromancy
Absorb Necromancy.description: A protosoul is made of necromantic energy. Any time it would be affected by another creature's non-cantrip necromancy spell, after applying its immunity, it also regains @Damage[10[healing]] Hit Points.

Engulf.name: Engulf
Engulf.description:
@Check[reflex|dc:30], @Damage[2d8[force],3d8[void]]{2d8 force damage plus 3d8 void damage}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} DC 30, Rupture 25

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.Engulf]

Unstable Magic.name: Unstable Magic
Unstable Magic.description: The roiling protosoul can't be healed or Repaired, and is destroyed at 0 Hit Points. So long as it is not destroyed, it naturally recovers @Damage[77[healing]] Hit Points each day. Each time a roiling protosoul casts one of its non-cantrip spells, it drains its own magic to do so, taking @Damage[6[force]] damage.

Enervation (At Will, see Unstable Magic).name: Enervation (At Will, see Unstable Magic)
Enervation (At Will, see Unstable Magic).description:
Extending a finger, you fire a beam of void energy that weakens the life force of any creature it touches. Each living creature in the line must attempt a Fortitude save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes @Damage[(floor(@item.rank/2))d8[persistent,void]] damage.

Failure The creature takes @Damage[(floor(@item.rank/2)*2)d8[persistent,void]] damage and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1}.

Critical Failure The creature takes @Damage[(floor(@item.rank/2)*2)d8[persistent,void]] damage and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 1}.

Heightened (+2) The persistent void damage increases by 1d8 on a success, or by 2d8 on a failure or critical failure.

Sudden Blight (At Will, see Unstable Mag.name: Sudden Blight (At Will, see Unstable Magic)
Sudden Blight (At Will, see Unstable Mag.description:
You accelerate the processes of decay in the area. Each living creature in the area takes @Damage[2d10[void]] damage (basic Fortitude save). A creature afflicted by a disease takes a -2 circumstance penalty to this save.You can also direct the blight to rot all Small and Tiny non-creature plants in the area, eliminating non-magical undergrowth and any resulting difficult terrain, cover, and concealment. Sudden blight attempts to counteract any magical effect on the plants before withering them.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d10.

Chill Touch.name: Chill Touch
Chill Touch.description:
Siphoning void energy into yourself, your hand radiates a pale darkness. Your touch weakens the living and disorients undead, possibly even causing them to flee. The effect depends on whether the target is living or undead.

  • Living Creature The spell deals void damage equal to 1d4 plus your spellcasting modifier. The target attempts a basic Fortitude save, but is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} for 1 round on a critical failure.
  • Undead Creature The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} for 1 round on a failed Fortitude save.
